attributes.action: Carry on driving test during second lockdown
attributes.additional_details: I would like them to do this as it’s very hard for young key workers to get to work relying on family members to get there especially when we are in a lockdown so by carrying on the driving test will allow young key workers to get to work without having to worry about getting there or back.
attributes.background: I would like the government to continue practical driving test throughout the second lockdown to help young key workers get to work.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
